metadata.title: CVE-2015-2063 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in unace 1.2b allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (crash) via a small file header in an ace archive, which triggers abuffer overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2063` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

unace - 1.2b-12
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unace package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2b-12').
